attributes.action: Reinstate funding for Plymouth Learning Shop, Plymouth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government has withdrawn funding for the above Cornwall College establishment.  This has led to the announcement that Plymouth Learning Shop will close at the end of December 2007, meaning hundreds of people who travel from a 20-30 mile radius of Plymouth and local Plymouth people will lose this vital service.  The Government is eager to get people off benefits and back into work are they?????
